CustomField.description: US Postal Service code assigned to this business address to aid in mail delivery. The code is 1 letter for the carrier route type (city, rural, PO Box, or highway) and 3 digits for the carrier code.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: US Postal Service code assigned to this business address to aid in mail delivery. The code is 1 letter for the carrier route type (city, rural, PO Box, or highway) and 3 digits for the carrier code.
CustomField.label: Carrier Route
